meanings.definition: The inner self of an individual; the soul.
meanings.sent1: She believed her anima guided her to make the right decisions.
meanings.sent2: His anima was at peace with the world around him.
meanings.sent3: The anima of the storybook character always knew the best adventures to go on.
meanings.sent4: The anima of the forest whispered secrets to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The anima of the old house seemed to watch over its inhabitants.

meanings.definition: The part of the psyche that is directed inward, in contrast to the persona.
meanings.sent1: Her anima often reflected her true feelings when her persona did not.
meanings.sent2: He explored his anima through introspection and self-reflection.
meanings.sent3: The anima of the dreamer danced freely while the persona stayed reserved.
meanings.sent4: The anima of the artist painted emotions that the persona could not express.
meanings.sent5: The anima of the introvert thrived in solitude away from the persona's demands.

meanings.definition: The life force or vital principle in living beings.
meanings.sent1: The anima of the injured bird slowly faded as it struggled to survive.
meanings.sent2: In traditional beliefs, the anima is thought to leave the body at death.
meanings.sent3: The anima of the plant seemed to brighten when placed in sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The anima of the newborn puppy filled the room with energy and joy.
meanings.sent5: The anima of the ocean pulsed with the rhythm of the tides.
